meanings.definition: A person who is extremely interested in and knowledgeable about a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: Geeks love to learn everything about computers.
meanings.sent2: My friends are geeks when it comes to video games.
meanings.sent3: The geeks in the coding club always have the coolest projects.
meanings.sent4: She is a math geek, always solving complex problems with ease.
meanings.sent5: The geeks at the science fair amazed everyone with their inventions.

meanings.definition: To be or become extremely excited or enthusiastic about a subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: I geeks out whenever a new movie from my favorite director is released.
meanings.sent2: They geeks over the latest technology trends.
meanings.sent3: He geeks every time he sees a new comic book in the store.
meanings.sent4: The fans geeks about the upcoming concert of their favorite band.
meanings.sent5: She geeks with joy when she hears good news from her friends.
